member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlTableSpanCollection
member.summary: Typed sorted list on span in table.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.OpenXmlDocumentStyleCollection
member.summary: Typed collection that holds the Style of a document and their name. OpenXml is case-sensitive but CSS is not. This collection handles both cases.

member.summary: Gets the style associated with the specified name.
member.param: The name whose style to get.
Specify the type of style seeked (Paragraph or Character).
When this method returns, the style associated with the specified name, if the key is found; otherwise, returns null. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

member.summary: The list of paragraphs that will be returned.

member.summary: Constructor.

member.summary: Start the parse processing.
member.returns: Returns a list of parsed paragraph.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.ParseHtml(System.String)
member.summary: Start the parse processing and append the converted paragraphs into the Body of the document.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.RemoveEmptyParagraphs
member.summary: Remove empty paragraph unless 2 tables are side by side. These paragraph could be empty due to misformed html or spaces in the html source.

member.summary: Save the actual list and restart with a new one. Continue to process until we found endTag.

member.summary: Add a new paragraph, table, ... to the list of processed paragrahs. This method takes care of adding the new element to the current table if it exists.

member.summary: Gets or sets where to render the acronym or abbreviation tag.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.ConsiderDivAsParagraph
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether the
tag should be processed as

(default false). It depends whether you consider

as part of the layout or as part of a text field.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.ExcludeLinkAnchor
member.summary: Gets or sets whether anchor links are included or not in the conversion.
member.remarks:
An anchor is a term used to define a hyperlink destination inside a document. .
It exists some predefined anchors used by Word such as _top to refer to the top of the document. The anchor #_top is always accepted regardless this property value. For others anchors like refering to your own bookmark or a title, add a and elements and set the value of href to #<name of your bookmark>.

member.summary: Gets the Html styles manager mapping to OpenXml style properties.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.PredefinedStyles.Caption
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <w:rPr xmlns:w="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main"><w:b /><w:bCs /><w:color w:val="4F81BD" w:themeColor="accent1" /><w:sz w:val="18" /><w:szCs w:val="18" /></w:rPr>.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <w:rPr xmlns:w="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main"> <w:rFonts w:asciiTheme="majorHAnsi" w:hAnsiTheme="majorHAnsi" w:eastAsiaTheme="majorEastAsia" w:cstheme="majorBidi" /> <w:b /> <w:bCs /> <w:color w:val="365F91" w:themeColor="accent1" w:themeShade="BF" /> <w:sz w:val="28" /> <w:szCs w:val="28" /> </w:rPr>.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator.MoveUntilMatch(System.String)
member.summary: Use as MoveNext() but this function will stop once the current value is equals to tag.
member.param: The tag to stop on (Optional).
member.returns:
If tag is null, it returns true if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; false if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
If tag is not null, it returns false as long as the tag was not found.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.UnitMetric
member.summary: Specifies the measurement values of a Html Unit.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.UnitMetric.EM
member.summary: 1em is equal to the current font size.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.UnitMetric.Ex
member.summary: one ex is the x-height of a font (x-height is usually about half the font-size)

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.UnitMetric.Auto
member.summary: Not convertible to any other units.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlBorder.Right

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlBorder.IsEmpty

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin
member.summary: Represents a Html Unit (ie: 120px, 10em, ...).

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parse the margin style attribute.
member.remarks:
The margin property can have from one to four values. margin:25px 50px 75px 100px; top margin is 25px right margin is 50px bottom margin is 75px left margin is 100px
margin:25px 50px 75px; top margin is 25px right and left margins are 50px bottom margin is 75px
margin:25px 50px; top and bottom margins are 25px right and left margins are 50px
margin:25px; all four margins are 25px

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Bottom
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit of the bottom side.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit of the left side.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit of the top side.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Right
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit of the right side.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.IsEmpty
member.summary: Gets whether at least one side has been specified.

member.summary: The common characters considered as white space.

member.summary: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded into a decoded string, and sends the decoded string to a System.IO.TextWriter output stream.

member.summary: Converts a string that represents an Html-encoded URL to a decoded string.

member.summary: Gets whether a given character is allowed by XML 1.0.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ImageHeader
member.summary: Taken from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/111345/getting-image-dimensions-without-reading-the-entire-file/111349 Minor improvements including supporting unsigned 16-bit integers when decoding Jfif and added logic to load the image using new Bitmap if reading the headers fails

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ImageHeader.GetDimensions(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the dimensions of an image.
member.param: The path of the image to get the dimensions of.
member.returns: The dimensions of the specified image.
member.exception: The image was of an unrecognised format.

member.summary: Resize an image keeping its aspect ratio.

member.summary: Gets the dimensions of an image.
member.returns: The dimensions of the specified image.
member.exception: The image was of an unrecognised format.
